arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta shows his true colours with Arsenal gesture before Atletico Madrid clash
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta welcomed back one of Arsenal's former academy prospects to the Sobha Realty Training Centre ahead of this evening's clash against Atletico Madrid

arts.ttl: 'Not what people expect' - Why Arsenal vs. Atletico will not be defence vs. defence
arts.sum: Arsenal and Atletico Madrid should not play out a drab goalless draw that some perhaps expect from Tuesday's Champions League clash, Gunners expert Charles Watts explains to Sports Mole.

arts.ttl: Arsenal apologise to Atletico about hot water failure
arts.sum: Arsenal apologise to Atletico Madrid after a hot water failure at Emirates Stadium sees the Spanish side heading to their hotel for showers following a training session.

arts.ttl: Why Atletico Madrid Have Launched ‘Official Complaint’ Against Arsenal
arts.sum: The situation could add extra flavour to the pair’s Champions League encounter.

arts.ttl: Arsenal apologise after Atletico Madrid left with cold water in changing rooms
arts.sum: The La Liga side made a complaint to Uefa before returning to their hotel for showers following training ahead of Tuesday’s Champions League clash

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid are already angry at Arsenal and the Champions League clash hasn’t even kicked off
Arsenal issue response to 'furious' Atletico Madrid over Champions League row
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid were left furious with the issues at the Emirates Stadium on Monday night, ahead of their Champions League meeting with Arsenal on Tuesday

arts.ttl: Arsenal could extend impressive run against Spanish teams against Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Arsenal will face Atletico Madrid in the Champions League tonight, seeking to extend their impressive record against Spanish opponents in European competition. Over the years, the Gunners have frequently crossed paths with clubs from Spain, often producing memorable encounters on the continental stage. arts.ttl: Atletico anger at Arsenal 'dirty' tactics: Diego Simeone's team report the Gunners to UEFA after hot water failure at the Emirates
arts.sum: Rule number one before playing Diego Simeone's Atletico Madrid side is not to make them angry... But Arsenal have infuriated their Champions League opponents ahead of Tuesday night's game.
